5.eng-name: Establishing the Prayer and the Sunnah Regarding Them

hadiths.text: It was narrated that Abu Hurairah said:“The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said: ‘On Friday there is a time when no Muslim man happens to stand in prayer at that time, asking Allah for good things, but He will give that to him.” And he gestured with his hand to indicate how short that time is

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي السَّاعَةِ الَّتِي تُرْجَى فِي الْجُمُعَةِ
chapter.eng-name: What was narrated concerning the hour that is hoped for on Friday
